metadata.title: CVE-2017-7109 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11 isaffected. Safari before 11 is affected. iCloud before 7.0 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. A cross-site scripting(XSS) vulnerability allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scriptor HTML via crafted web content that incorrectly interacts with theApplication Cache policy.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
